events.text: Who are you? What are you doing here?

I am a Guardian of the IDE Tome. I am a “Construct”, created by the wizards from the research institute to protect it. But after the disaster caused by the failed experiment, as people evacuated in panic.
someone from the institute took the IDE Tome to the small kingdom of Objecthia to secure the important artifact from bugs and destruction.
Constructs are, human-like creation, often magical beings, crafted through Advanced ClassCraft Magic and OOP Magic. They can be imbued with life, intelligence, and purpose.
Valen's mind raced with questions, his heart sinking further at the realization that the tome was no longer within his grasp. Valen clenched his fists, his resolve hardening despite the setback.
Then I must retrieve it. I have to get back to my world.
Be careful. Objecthia is not what it used to be. The Bug King resides there now, and the road ahead will be perilous.
